publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-669 Sarah Boyack: Special Grant Report No.3 - Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area—That the Transport and the Environment Committee in consideration of Special Grant Report No.3 - Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area recommends that the Report be approved.

S1M-669 Sarah Boyack: Special Grant Report No.3 - Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area—That the Transport and the Environment Committee in consideration of Special Grant Report No.3 - Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area recommends that the Report be approved.

S1M-669 Sarah Boyack: Special Grant Report No.3 - Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area—That the Transport and the Environment Committee in consideration of Special Grant Report No.3 - Special Grant Report on Grant in Aid of Expenditure on Rail Services in the Strathclyde Passenger Transport Area recommends that the Report be approved.
